DOC.detailed_description: The study conduct determine recovery [ 14C ] -CORT125134 administration single oral dose [ 14C ] -CORT125134 , determine route rate elimination [ 14C ] -CORT125134 associate radioactivity body , measure concentration radioactivity blood . Additional objective study determine chemical structure significant metabolite plasma , urine feces . Safety tolerability assess .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male healthy female nonchildbearing potential ( surgically sterilize postmenopausal [ define woman least 12 month history amenorrhea folliclestimulating hormone ( FSH ) > 40 international unit per liter ( IU/L ) absence reversible medical iatrogenic cause ] ) Age 30 65 year age A history regular bowel movement ( average ≥1 ≤3 stool per day ) Must willing able communicate participate whole study Must provide write informed consent Male subject must agree use adequate method contraception Subjects willing abide study restriction Participation clinical research study within previous 3 month Subjects previously enrol study subject previously treat CORT125134 History drug alcohol abuse past 2 year Regular alcohol consumption male > 21 unit per week female > 14 unit per week ( 1 unit = ½ pint beer , 25 milliliter ( mL ) 40 % spirit 125 mL glass wine ) Current smoker smoke within last 12 month ; include cigarette , ecigarettes nicotine replacement product . A breath carbon monoxide read great 10 part per million ( ppm ) Females childbearing potential ( female subject must negative urine pregnancy test ) Male subject pregnant partner Radiation exposure exceed 5 millisievert ( mSv ) last 12 month 10 mSv last 5 year . The measurement include exposure present study , diagnostic x ray medical exposure , excludes background radiation . No occupationally expose worker , define Ionising Radiation Regulations 1999 . Positive drug abuse test result Subjects taking , take , prescribed overthecounter drug ( 4 gram per day paracetamol ) herbal remedy 14 day study drug administration . Hormone replacement therapy permit
